main prediction method. does prediction using _return_predict() and _weight_optimizion() helper functions.

optimizes weights using efficient frontier. helper function for the main predict method.

sklearn.model

predict(test_data, initial_capital=1000000, transaction_cost_pct=0.001, feature_list=['macd', 'boll_ub', 'boll_lb', 'rsi_30', 'cci_30', 'dx_30', 'close_30_sma', 'close_60_sma', 'close'])

Main prediction method.

Parameters

  • test_data (pd.DataFrame) – test data

  • initial_capital (int) – initial capital

  • feature_list (list) – a list of features to be used for prediction

  • transaction_cost_pct (float) – transaction cost

Returns

portfolio with dates and account value pd.DataFrame: dataframe that holds info for each ticker for each day the weight and predicted y value.

Return type

pd.DataFrame

  • train_y (pd.DataFrame) – train_y data
